website_summaries.verdict: A heavy-duty pot that functions well and delivers a nice poached egg in five minutes.
pros: Can poach six eggs at the same time
Non stick surface for the egg cups
Stainless steel construction on the pan
cons: The eggs can still get stuck in these non-stick cups and work best with a little olive oil dabbed in the cups ahead of time

customer_reviews.title: Sharp Edges That Cut
customer_reviews.text: I was happy to receive the RSVP 6 Egg Poacher until I opened the box and removed the poacher pan. I removed the protective cardboard from the handle but upon placing my hand on the handle to pick up the poacher pan, I sustained a cut to the palm of my hand from the very sharp edge at the end of the handle. I also noticed a smaller cut from the metal seam on the bottom of the handle. This was enough for me to return the poacher.
customer_reviews.author: Coliwabl

customer_reviews.title: I use mine frequently and love it. So much better than poaching them in ...
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I would change is to make the ring you grasp to lift the egg tray out a little taller so as to make it easier to grasp, since it’s hot. I use mine frequently and love it. So much better than poaching them in a pan without these little cups. Super easy to clean, too.
customer_reviews.author: L Magpali

customer_reviews.title: Cooks the eggs even
customer_reviews.text: Best poacher ever. I bought this for my husband for Christmas and he loves it. Cooks even and cleaning is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love this egg poacher! i am wondering why I didn’t buy one years ago... The eggs came out perfect...and I am tough to please with kitchen gadgets! Craziest thing...they shipped the egg poacher pan in its original box...it came banged up but everything was in there! Love Love Love it!
customer_reviews.author: richard kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Good pan but too expensive
customer_reviews.text: The pan is fine and heavy gauge but my daughter in law got a very similar egg poacher at walmart for 6 eggs and it was half the price--considered sending it back but didn't bother --should have done so
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: It was a gift.
customer_reviews.text: I gave the poacher as a gift to my daughter-in-law. She reported the poacher worked well but end of the handle was very sharp. When grasped, it could cause an injury. Also the handle became very hot while poaching the eggs.
customer_reviews.author: Rose McLees

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: gave to my daughter and her boyfriend, they love it!
customer_reviews.author: wvyk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE that it was 6 egg spots. Easy in / easy out and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Donehue

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Eggs Every Time!
customer_reviews.text: Received egg poacher quickly and in perfect condition. Makes perfect eggs. Instructions say NOT to use cooking spray but we found it is best to use it along with a soft, narrow spatula to remove eggs.
customer_reviews.author: Bert Blais

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product - LOVE it! Perfect for family breakfast. Holiday breakfast. Easy to clean and use. Will last FOREVER.
customer_reviews.text: Love the pan. Quality pan. My brother burned it and now it is in the garbage (he cooked the eggs without any water in the pan- he has mental illness diagnosis). :( Very sad. Some day I hope to afford another one.
customer_reviews.author: joe franko, jr

customer_reviews.title: Worked Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: We used this poacher for the first time last evening and it worked like a charm. Used butter-flavored non-stick spray on the cups and the eggs literally slid out onto the plates. Very, very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Florida Gal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice poacher. I recommend using a little butter or pam to help reeve the poached egg
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The handle gets a little hot There was a little dent at the bottom corner of the pan box was trashed when delivered like it was dropped
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: It's Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect! Just what I was looking for! Makes perfect poached eggs, and it's really easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle W. Flannery-Alderman

customer_reviews.title: the best
customer_reviews.text: best poacher I have used, after buying two others. the eggs come out perfect and its a easy clean up. What could be better?
customer_reviews.author: Ella Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gives poached eggs an easy way to make... virtually no mess to clean up..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We have already used this multiple times and love it. Without the holes in the bottom of ...
customer_reviews.text: We have already used this multiple times and love it. Without the holes in the bottom of the egg cups as our other one does, cleanup is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn L. Minor

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I volunteer cook for seniors and this pan is just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Kiely

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for commercial use and it works well, thumb up.
customer_reviews.author: Yen-Ting Wu

customer_reviews.title: Poaching Pan
customer_reviews.text: Perfect when you need to serve several all at once. Works well on the stovetop or induction cooking. Ranks up there with bigger name branded pans.
customer_reviews.author: Greg F.

customer_reviews.title: A Disaster....
customer_reviews.text: This Poacher looked like the best and turned out to be the worst. Eggs stick in the cups whether you use oil, butter or spray.This causes the eggs to break when you remove them plus it's a nightmare to then clean the cups. I wish I could return mine, but as it was a Xmas gift, I am passed the return period. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew M.

customer_reviews.title: The poacher leaks steam around the entire lid
customer_reviews.text: Instead of steam coming out of only the vent hole it leaks around the lid in many places.This leads to it being less efficent.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am delighted with the egg poacher and use it several times a week.
customer_reviews.author: Karen from Florida

customer_reviews.title: eggs do not cook whites fully at 4 min I've loved poached eggs for many years I hate this pan
customer_reviews.text: eggs stick to cup. eggs do not cook whites fully at 4 min I've loved poached eggs for many years I hate this pan. TRASH
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cooks poached eggs just like your Mom used to make
customer_reviews.text: These are just like what your mom used to cook because she couldnt be bothered to boil water and swirl it around to get that restaurant look. Lets be real, you whip that skill out once to impress the loved one then just give em the dome shaped versions. Easy to use and tastes like egg.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Better quality pan
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered the same type of poacher a few months before and I and ruined the pan. My fault. I ordered a new one from International and when I received the new one ... what a difference. Better quality pan, egg holder, and poacher cups. I would rate this one a 10 out of 10.
customer_reviews.author: Lori,Farrington

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: This absolutely is no good, the cups are not even Teflon every egg sticks and can’t be taken out. Once you finally get the egg out it’s a mess. Then you have to figure out how to clean the part that’s stuck in the cup . Good idea if it actually had a good Teflon
customer_reviews.author: esameralda

customer_reviews.title: Great Poacher
customer_reviews.text: This egg poacher is great however it handles do get very hot like some other peple have mentioned. I managed to find a silicone cover for my handle that was originally for a cast iron skillet. It was tight to get on, but now that it's there it makes the pot easy to handle. I sprayed the egg cups with PAM and the eggs popped out nice and easy. I would make the recommendation to the manufacturer to put a rubber coated handle on both the pot and the lid to make for easier handling while cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Canuck,,,

customer_reviews.title: I am an egg poaching machine
customer_reviews.text: With a family of 4 boys, we eat a lot of eggs! I have poached over a 100 or so thus far, and no issues. It works great, the non stick cups make cleanup easy, the pan has a heavy duty bottom to distribute heat. The pan is staring to discolor, but I am not worried about that, as it does not affect the function.
customer_reviews.author: MotorcycleMike

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: This product wasn't as expected for the price. The handle is cheap, flimsy and hot to the touch. The wire cup holders are too low and difficult to pick up. Nice that the lid has a vent hole. Otherwise, it's going back.
customer_reviews.author: Minnabean

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great, Heavy Duty pan. Nonstick cups. Produces great poached eggs with no fuss!
customer_reviews.author: Hammer

customer_reviews.title: 2nd time around
customer_reviews.text: We have had one of these for over 15 years. misplaced it, purchesed it again.
customer_reviews.author: C Washam

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is an attractive professional-quality piece of cookware. It is easy to use, easy to clean up. Recipes are included in the instructions and it arrived quickly. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: M. Stroginis

customer_reviews.title: Eggs Benedict Rule!
customer_reviews.text: I love the 6 egg cooker when I want to cook for more people than just myself. I also have another cooker for 6 but it is an insert that goes into my dutch oven and this cooker is much quicker so I spend less time cooking and more time eating!!
customer_reviews.author: queenski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everyone loves my poached eggs now that I can cook six perfectly poached eggs at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Kayjay

customer_reviews.title: Great poacher
customer_reviews.text: My favorite poacher, tried others but this his is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Sue

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We use this about every 2 weeks and it still looks new. Cleans up easily. I wish I'd bought it years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Missied

customer_reviews.title: but it arrived in very bad
customer_reviews.text: The product itself was exactly what I wanted, but it arrived in very bad shape
customer_reviews.author: ladybugg

customer_reviews.title: A++++++
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend (he's 64) who loves to make poached eggs on the weekend. It's perfect, and makes perfect poached eggs. They cook very quickly, and he says the cups work better if you spray them with cooking spray first.. He loves this, and uses it very often, and it is of very high quality
customer_reviews.author: D. Hooks

customer_reviews.title: wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this item for my boyfriend's parents, who have a tradition of poaching eggs every Christmas morning. In years past there has always been a struggle to cook perfectly poached eggs for a group. This poacher was quick, easy, and resulted in perfectly done eggs with little need for skill!
customer_reviews.author: litsa3

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We have a family tradition of making eggs benedict for holiday breakfasts. We have to make 12 eggs and we have never had a poacher do such a good job. This 6 egg poacher makes PERFECT eggs.
customer_reviews.author: Almost 60 - woman driver!

product_meta.title: RSVP International 6-c. Endurance Egg Poacher.
product_meta.description: This 6-cup egg poacher is made of 18/10 stainless steel with a center handled insert tray to remove eggs easily. The 18/8 stainless pan has an encapsulated tri-ply base, long handle, and tempered glass lid. Poach perfect eggs inside nonstick cup. Beautiful presentation for eggs benedict. Handle on cup allows each egg to be cooked to order, removed individually when egg is done. Each set includes directions and recipes..

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars84 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
